abstracts.cdata!:
This Results Profile focuses on enhanced
            public-private partnership in delivery of water services in
            Armenia. For many years most of the water supply and
            sanitation systems in Armenia were in serious state of
            disrepair. Municipal Water and Wastewater Project introduced
            a successful public and private partnership for the
            management of water and wastewater services in Armenia. As a
            result, the water utility brought life back to around 2.66
            million people in rural areas.
